alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marineland, or near Palm Coast, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Crescent City, Andalusia, Marineland and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
